author: Mario

review: I had wanted to be able to "cast" webpages from my tablet, but that is no longer an option.  I have a Roku which does everything else the chromecast does.  I don't need another device duplicating what I already have.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Works perfectly.  I bought this so that I can stream youtube since my Roku doesn't have that capability.  Just plug it in and start using it.  I also have a PS3 that you can use to watch youtube, but using the PS3 remote to type in a youtube search is tedious.  Using the chromecast with a tablet is very easy!
author: Joseph Whitney

review: The Chromecast works the way it is intended to. However, after a using the Chromecast for over two month it still does not have a lot of apps that one can use. I have only seen Netflix, YouTube, and Pandora. If you download the Apple app for Chromecast the only two channels that can be used are Netflix and YouTube. With all this said, the Chromecast is a great product for the money. The cliche quote definitely applies here, "You get what you pay for". I have faith that Google will provide more content in the future. If anything changes, I will add to my review.The dongle itself must be connected to a power supply either on your t.v. set or to the wall. This extends the size of the dongle. In addition, if the dongle does not fit into your T.V.'s HDMI port you will have to connect the extender, provided in the box.
author: J. Molina
